name: Shops
description: The Shops module provides a fallback shop system when inventory modules don't support native shop functionality. It creates a simple, universal shop interface that works across all frameworks.

clientFunctions.name: FinalizeCheckOut
clientFunctions.description: Internal function to finalize shop purchases with payment options.
clientFunctions.example: -- Internal use only - handles payment selection UI

clientFunctions.name: OpenShop
clientFunctions.description: Opens a registered shop interface for the player.

parameters.name: shopTitle
parameters.description: The title/name of the shop to display

parameters.name: inventory
parameters.description: Table of items available in the shop

clientFunctions.name: AmountSelect
clientFunctions.description: This is an internal event that is used to open the amount select menu

serverFunctions.name: CompleteCheckout
serverFunctions.description: Internal function to process shop purchases and handle payments.
serverFunctions.example: -- Internal use only - processes payments and gives items

serverFunctions.name: CreateShop
serverFunctions.description: Creates a new shop that can be opened by players. Used as fallback when inventory systems don't support shops.

parameters.name: shopInventory
parameters.description: Table of items with prices and labels

parameters.name: shopCoords
parameters.description: Coordinates where the shop is located

parameters.name: shopGroups
parameters.description: Job groups that can access this shop

returns.description: True if shop was created successfully

serverFunctions.name: OpenShop
serverFunctions.description: Opens a created shop for a specific player.

parameters.name: shopTitle
parameters.description: Name of the shop to open

returns.description: True if shop was opened successfully

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Open shop for player
local success = Bridge.Shops.OpenShop(source, "247_store_1")
if success then
    print("Shop opened for player " .. source)
else
    print("Failed to open shop")
end

notes: This module serves as a fallback when inventory systems don't support native shop functionality
Shop transactions automatically handle money removal and item addition
Supports both cash (money) and bank payments
Shop items must be pre-registered with CreateShop before they can be purchased
Integrates with the Framework module for balance checking and the Inventory module for item delivery
